verses.1: Topa in uk hi. Leitung lungdam henla, tuikulh neu tampite zong lungdam ta uh hen.
verses.2: Meiipite le khuamial sahpite ama kiimah om a, thumanna le thutannate ama tokhom bulpi ahi hi.
verses.3: Ama mai ah mei pai a, ama kiim a om a galte a kaang tum hi.
verses.4: Ama khuaphialepte in leitung taangsak a, leitung in mu-in a liing hi.
verses.5: Topaʼ mai, leitung mi khempeuhʼ Topaʼ mai ah mual liante khuainun bangin a tui suak uh hi.
verses.6: Vantungte in ama thumanna gen khia uh a, mi khempeuh in ama minthanna mu uh hi.
verses.7: Bangmah a man lo milimte a kisaktheih pih, milim a bia mi khempeuhte maizumin kikoih a, ama mai ah pasian khempeuh kun uh hi.
verses.8: Pasian aw, Zion in za-in nuam a, na thukhennate hangin Judah khuapite lungdam uh hi.
verses.9: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa aw, leitung khempeuh a ukpa na hi a, pasian dang khempeuh sangin nakpi takin na lian zaw hi.
verses.10: Topa in gitlohna a mudahte it a, amah in a mi siangthoteʼ nuntakna siat nading pan a kem hi. Amah in migiloteʼ khut sung panin amaute a hon khia hi.
verses.11: Thuman miteʼ tungah khuavak hong taang a, lungsim thutang mite tungah lungdamna hong tung hi.
verses.12: Thuman mite aw, Topaʼ nasepnate hangin lungdam unla, ama min siangtho phat un.
